    • A Basic Analysis Workflow For AIM

Writing out shapefiles of benchmarked points

Writes out a point shapefile for each management question of points which were classified using the benchmarks for that question. Each

write.benchmarkshp(points.benchmarked, tdat, out.path, name)

Arguments

points.benchmarked

Data frame output from benchmark().
tdat

A Spatial Points Data Frame containing the relevant geometry and fields called PLOTID and PRIMARYKEY.
out.path

A string specifying the output folder path.
name

A string of the project name for use in the filename, e.g. "Idaho_SageGrouse".

Contents

  • Arguments

Developed by Nelson Stauffer, Steve Garman.
